name: com.strodio.pwa-install-manager
description: PWA Install Manager for Unity WebGL

samples.description:
An out-of-the-box WebGL template with added PWA install prompt code.

Usage:
▪ Place the template folder in the Assets/WebGLTemplates folder of your project.
▪ Go to Player settings (menu: Edit > Project Settings > Player).
▪ Set the platform-specific settings to Web.
▪ Open Resolution and Presentation.
